Articles.Content:
I'm trying to build a plane in the hanger but when I try to do symmetry, it flips it upside down on the other side. Is there a way to fix this?

Thanks

Edited December 19, 2014 by BigDaz

"F", "R", and "X" all modify symmetry options. F & R were just added. Give those a try and see if that helps.

Cheers,

-Claw

There's an option now to toggle between radial and mirror symmetry, by pressing the r key. That looks like you accidentally switched to radial symmetry, so hitting r again should switch it back.

*edit: ninja'd. Weird that the timestamp on Claw's post is from before I loaded this page but his post wasn't showing.

Yep hitting r and switching to mirror fixed it. It'd be good if there was a visible button for it.

Anyway, thanks lads.
